snippet.title: Project Hardcore - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
After 25 years , its about time to get HARDCORE!
A mystery in video game history and in the legacy of DICE is about to be solved.


Coming to PS4 and PS Vita in 2019

https://www.project-hardcore.net/
https://www.strictlylimitedgames.com/
FB: https://www.facebook.com/StrictlyLTDGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RealStrictlyLTD/

Music: MEGA DRIVE - Activate Your Steel
Trailer: Marcel Gülzow / Commander Marcel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcZ-MWYLbg3do065IY_YJ9A)
